sentences.sentence: She was expressly forbidden to touch my papers.
sentences.translation: 已经明确禁止她动我的文件。

sentences.sentence: He has expressly forbidden her to go out on her own.
sentences.translation: 他已明确禁止她独自外出。

sentences.sentence: In signing the measure, California Governor Jerry Brown admitted that the law, which expressly classifies people on the basis of sex, is probably unconstitutional.
sentences.translation: 在签署该法案时，加州州长杰里·布朗承认，这条明确将人按照性别分类的法规很可能是违反宪法的。
